name: The Brine
description: Brine seeps into the meat to moisten and tenderize just enough to prevent it from drying out when cooked. The meat breaks down progressively, so once you get into the second-day range, be warned that the texture becomes -- how do we professionals put it? -- weird.
keywords: dairy-free, fall, spring, summer, winter, maple syrup, salt

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients in a bowl. Stir until salt and sugar dissolve.
